flavor_text_entries.diamond:
As a protective technique, it can
completely freeze its fur to make
its hairs stand like needles.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
As a protective technique, it can
completely freeze its fur to make
its hairs stand like needles.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
By controlling its body heat, it can
freeze the atmosphere around it
to make a diamond-dust flurry.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
It causes small ice crystals to form by
lowering the temperature of the
surrounding atmosphere.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
It causes small ice crystals to form by
lowering the temperature of the
surrounding atmosphere.
flavor_text_entries.black:
By controlling its body heat, it can
freeze the atmosphere around it
to make a diamond-dust flurry.
flavor_text_entries.white:
By controlling its body heat, it can
freeze the atmosphere around it
to make a diamond-dust flurry.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
It lowers its body heat to freeze its
fur. The hairs then become like needles
it can fire.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
It lowers its body heat to freeze its
fur. The hairs then become like needles
it can fire.
flavor_text_entries.x:
By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the
atmosphere around it to make a
diamond-dust flurry.
flavor_text_entries.y:
It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs
then become like needles it can fire.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the
atmosphere around it to make a
diamond-dust flurry.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs
then become like needles it can fire.
flavor_text_entries.sun:
It can control its body temperature at will.
This enables it to freeze the moisture in the
atmosphere, creating flurries of diamond dust.
flavor_text_entries.moon:
It freezes its fur into icicles, spiky and sharp,
and tackles its prey.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
It protects itself by freezing its fur into sharp
needles. It can drop its body temperature below
–75 degrees Fahrenheit.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
It can instantaneously freeze any moisture
that’s around it, creating ice pellets to shoot at
its prey.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
Any who become captivated by the beauty of
the snowfall that Glaceon creates will be frozen
before they know it.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
The coldness emanating from Glaceon causes
powdery snow to form, making it quite a popular
Pokémon at ski resorts.
flavor_text_entries.legends-arceus:
Glaceon is able to lower its body temperature very quickly.
It freezes the atmosphere, creating diamond dust that glitters
like gems while it flutters and dances around.
